ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This paper reflects the authors' views. Neither the European Commission nor the World Health Organization, VITO, the UNEP-DTU partnership, ISCIII, WIV-ISP, KU Leuven or PHE are liable for any use that may be made of the information contained therein. We gratefully acknowledge the help and contributions of Dirk De Wolf and Herwin De Kind (Flemish Agency of Public Health), and Griet Lambrechts (Municipality of Antwerp).
